welcome_message_body: Welcome to Paisley, a charming town known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you enjoy exploring all the beauty and culture that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport is used for overflow flights and some low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
